snippet: The State Department of Parks and Recreation does not know how much it costs to operate each of California’s 270 state parks, beaches and recreational areas, according to an audit released Thursday.
abstract: Audit says California Department of Parks and Recreation does not know how much it costs to operate each of 270 state parks, beaches and recreational areas.
lead_paragraph: The State Department of Parks and Recreation does not know how much it costs to operate each of California’s 270 state parks, beaches and recreational areas, according to an audit released Thursday.
